dayata kirula wenuwen kotharam mudal nasthi kalath pradeshaye janathawage mulika saukhya sewawa sapayana monaragala disthrik maharohala thawamath hingana mattame pawathi.1.rohale pradhana gettuwen athuluwana witama thibena koridowa dige yanawita wasikili ganda nahayata dane.meyata hethuwa dadisathkara eekakaya asala thibena wiwrutha wasikili walaki.meyin nikuthwana wishabija hethuwen asala athi shalyagaraye,shalya wattuwe ha dadi sathkara eekakaye roginta siduwana haniya wishalaya.2.rohale shalyagaraye wahala mulumaninma abalanwa athi athara shalyakarma karana atharathura roginge sharirayata wahalen kunuwathura wate.3.shalyagaraye rogin eha meha genayamata aththe troli 3k pamani.dayata kirulata ena lokkanta hadisi anathurak wuwath yannata wenne oya troli thune thamayi.me siyaluma karana danata thawakalikawa yatapath karamin palasthara sobana aluthwadiyawak karamin pawathi.(uda:-biththiwala thintha gama.bima polish kirima.es 5 kramayata anugathawa athayi sandahan namapuwaru ellima.
thawa payakatath wada thiyenawa.

diganin tikat aran dunnu sahodaraya tikat aran dunneth sikurada eka mage un tika danne na mama tikata hari kiya kiya hitiye..eka uneth ape mara ge aanduwe karyakshayama thathwaye thawath ek prathipalayak widihata..mata tikat aran dunnu sahodaraya mulin ma digana wana sanrakshana departhamenthu karyalayata badada dinaye gos thibba ehen kiyala thiyenawa nuwara gihin kadawuru bumiya wen karana lipiya mulin labaganna kiyala ithin ee sahodaraya nuwara gihin ee katayuththa hamara karagannakota hawasa 2 pahu wela 2n passe tikat nikuth karanne na lu neh..ithin eeta pahuwa da enam burahaspathinda dawase digana karyalayata giyama tikat nikuth kirime niladariya tikat pothath aran gedara gihin..pahuwa da enna kiyala harola yawala..ithin sikurada thama ganna une..

eksath jathika paksha rajayak rata thula bihi kirima sandaha kriya kirima apage wagakima wu bawin ema wagakima itu kirima sandaha pakshaya samagi kara jayagrahanaya wetha meheya wimata me awasthawe sitina sudusuma nayakaya wathman niyojya nayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha bawa therum gath apa kandayama ethumagen paksha nayakathwaya bharaganna lesa karana lada illima ee mahatha nihathamaniwa piligaththe mema thiranayata wadathma kalabalayata path wuye mahinda rajapaksha palanayath rajya madhyath apa pakshaya thula sitimin mahinda rajapaksha palanaya shakthimath kirimata kriya karana araliyagaha mandiraye suwacha kikaru golayanuthya.
